1: -module(cache_storage_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: 
    5: -export([
    6:   set_get/1
    7:   ]).
    8: 
    9: -export([
   10:   all/0,
   11:   init_per_suite/1,
   12:   end_per_suite/1
   13: ]).
   14: 
   15: %%%===================================================================
   16: %%% Common Test
   17: %%%===================================================================
   18: 
   19: -spec all() -> [atom()].
   20: all() -> [set_get].
   21: 
   22: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   23:   _ = application:ensure_all_started(erlang_challenges),
   24:   #{expiration := Exp, gc_interval := Interval} = econfig:get(erlang_challenges, cache_storage),
   25:   ok = econfig:set(erlang_challenges, cache_storage, #{expiration => 1, gc_interval => 2}),
   26:   [{expiration, Exp}, {gc_interval, Interval} | Config].
   27: 
   28: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   29:   Interval = ?config(gc_interval, Config),
   30:   Exp      = ?config(expiration, Config),
   31:   Value    = #{expiration => Interval, gc_interval => Exp},
   32:   ok = econfig:set(erlang_challenges, cache_storage, Value).
   33: 
   34: 
   35: %%%===================================================================
   36: %%% Tests Cases
   37: %%%===================================================================
   38: 
   39: -spec set_get(eutils_ct:config()) -> any().
   40: set_get(_Config) ->
   41:   undefined = cache_storage:get(one),
   42: 
   43:   %% Entry one
   44:   value1 = cache_storage:set(one, value1),
   45:   value1 = cache_storage:get(one),
   46: 
   47:   %% Entry two
   48:   timer:sleep(1000),
   49:   value2 = cache_storage:set(two, value2),
   50:   value2 = cache_storage:get(two),
   51: 
   52:   undefined = cache_storage:get(one),
   53:   value2 = cache_storage:get(two),
   54: 
   55:   timer:sleep(1000),
   56:   %% cache_gc starts
   57:   undefined = cache_storage:get(two).
